en.title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Full Stack Developer always learning and passionate in new technologies. My top skills actually are Liferay, RESTful APIs, Angular, Javascript and Sass. This curriculum is a project made a long time ago (2013) which I updated and adapted it to nowadays (Oct 2020). With each game completed you unlock a part of my profile and if you get all gold stars you’ll have a 'surprise'.
